item.title: Banks Charge into Crypto Custody Amid Market Turbulence
item.description: With Bitcoin stumbling and gold on a tear, major banks like Morgan Stanley and Citi are pushing deeper into crypto custody and tokenization, while VC firm Paradigm eyes AI opportunities. Let's unpack what this means for the evolving landscape.
